events.title: Golden Hour Gathering
events.description: An evening of real connection and honest conversations. Meet ambitious women, share what's on your mind, and leave with new connections that actually matter.

events.title: Sunset & Strategy
events.description: Bring your big dreams and your questions. This session blends mindset coaching with real talk about building a life and business that actually works. Expect clarity, connection, and momentum.

events.title: Electric Evening
events.description: High energy, real conversations, and the kind of introductions that actually stick. This is networking for women who are done playing small and ready to level up.
